Package com.indeed.vw.wrapper.progvalidation

Package with implementation of multiple quality metrics, calculated in progressive validation style.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccuracyValidation
    correct predictions / total
    FOneScoreValidation
    See https://www.kaggle.com/wiki/MeanFScore
    LogLossValidation
    See https://www.kaggle.com/wiki/LogarithmicLoss
    MAEValidation
    https://www.kaggle.com/wiki/MeanAbsoluteError
    MAPEValidation
    See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mean_absolute_percentage_error
    Metrics
    Class that wraps multiple metrics and prints their scores every n examples.
    PrecisionValidation
    true positives / (true positives + false positives)
    ProgressiveValidation
    Base class for all metrics
    RecallValidation
    true positives / (true positives + false negatives)
    RMSEValidation
    See https://www.kaggle.com/wiki/RootMeanSquaredError

Package com.indeed.vw.wrapper.progvalidation Description

Package with implementation of multiple quality metrics, calculated in progressive validation style.
